meanings.sent1: The children played livelily in the park.
meanings.sent2: She danced livelily to the music at the party.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail livelily as it chased its own shadow.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset painted the sky livelily.
meanings.sent5: The flowers swayed livelily in the gentle breeze.
